name: AVIAPRO AVIATION
about: Aviapro Aviation Academy, founded in 2016 by Capt. Markos S. Rossis, is a premier institution for pilots, cabin crew, and aviation specialists. Our mission is to deliver advanced and comprehensive training programs using the best instructors and equipment. Our team consists of active and experienced pilots, cabin crew, and key managers worldwide, ensuring students are fully prepared to work for major airlines and organizations. We focus on more than just awarding certificates; we ensure our graduates are capable and industry-ready. With a strong vision to provide top-notch training, Aviapro Aviation Academy is committed to helping students achieve their aviation career goals. We pride ourselves on our professional and supportive environment, making us a trusted name in aviation training. At Aviapro, we are dedicated to shaping the future of aviation professionals.
